text: An la dique bu xian yi wenzi huo geng xiao de shiwu she renhe piyu; xindao zhe, dou zhidao na shi cong tamen de zhu suo jiang shi de zhenli; bu xindao zhe queshuo:“An la she zhege piyu de zongzhi shi shenme?” Ta yi piyu shi xuduo ren ru mitu, ye yi piyu shi xuduo ren shang zhenglu; dan chu beini zhe wai, ta bu yi piyu shi ren ru mitu
